description: This is a market on whether Iron Finance’s overall TVL will be above $2 billion on July 1, 2021, at 12:00 PM ET. This market will resolve to “Yes” if Iron Finance’s overall TVL is above $2,000,000,000 on July 1, 2021 at 12:00 PM ET, and “No” Otherwise. The resolution source will be https://polygon.iron.finance/ under the “Home” tab. The resolution source will be checked at exactly 12:00 PM ET on July 1, 2021. If the resolution source is for any reason unavailable, or the overall TVL number is unavailable on the webpage, the resolution source will be checked 1 hour later at 1:00 PM ET on July 1, 2021. If the resolution source or overall TVL number is still unavailable, the market will resolve to “No.” In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
